sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: A carpenter needs to cut a wooden board that is shaped like an equilateral triangle. If one side of the triangle is 6 inches long, what is the length of the other two sides of the triangle?
message_2: In an equilateral triangle, all three sides are of equal length. Since one side of the triangle is 6 inches long, the other two sides are also 6 inches long each.
